extracted_playbook.title: Identify Usage of Cisco SPA112 2-Port Phone Adapters
extracted_playbook.description: Check if Cisco SPA112 2-Port Phone Adapters are currently in use within the organization.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are Cisco SPA112 2-Port Phone Adapters in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Discontinue Use of Cisco SPA112 2-Port Phone Adapters
extracted_playbook.description: Stop using Cisco SPA112 2-Port Phone Adapters as they are no longer supported and vulnerable.

extracted_playbook.title: Verify Use of Similar Unsupported Products
extracted_playbook.description: Check for other similar products that may also be unsupported and vulnerable, and plan for their discontinuation.
